body:
Yandex (Russian google) is advertising their new translate system. And while it's not clear if they use SYSTRAN for translation like the rest (Google, Bing, Bable Fish), or rolled out their own SMT, they certainly merit a test drive.

Let's try translating a famous Russian pangram to English
— Съешь ещё этих мягких французских булок, да выпей чаю.

Yandex
— Eat more of these soft French rolls lazy.
Apparently, drinking tea is considered as lazy pastime by Yandex.

Bing
— Eat more of these soft French rolls, so drink some tea.
Eating French rolls is a prerequisite to drinking tea.

Google
— Eat more of these soft French rolls, but drink tea.
Eating French rolls and not drinking tea is hazardous to your health.

Correct translation
— Eat more of these soft French rolls and drink tea.
